mapper.insert: INSERT INTO surv(surv_no, surv_seqno, surv_title, surv_passwd, surv_startdate, surv_enddate, surv_cnt, surv_continue, surv_rdate, mem_no) VALUES(SURV_seq.nextval, #{surv_seqno}, #{surv_title}, #{surv_passwd}, #{surv_startdate}, #{surv_enddate}, 0, #{surv_continue}, sysdate, #{mem_no})
mapper.select: SELECT surv_no, surv_seqno, surv_title, surv_passwd, surv_startdate, surv_enddate, surv_cnt, surv_continue, surv_rdate, mem_no FROM SURV ORDER BY SURV_SEQNO DESC
